items.summary: Create a new SubmitReview component that displays a section with header 'Share Your Experience!' and subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.' with bilingual support (English and Bengali)

Implement review submission form in SubmitReview component with fields: Full Name (required text input), Class/Year (required text input), Subject(s) Studied (optional text input), Your Review (required textarea), and Rating (optional 1-5 star selector with clickable star icons)

Add Submit Review button to the form that validates required fields and displays confirmation message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' as a toast notification on successful submission

Store submitted reviews in backend using Motoko actor with stable storage, including fields: fullName (Text), classYear (Text), subjects (optional Text), review (Text), rating (optional Nat8), timestamp (Int), and approved (Bool for moderation)
Style SubmitReview component using clean card layout with borders or subtle shadow, consistent spacing, mobile-responsive design, and hover effects matching existing components
Integrate SubmitReview component into App.tsx below the Gallery section and before the AdmissionForm section, maintaining component flow and design consistency
